Excellent rip
A/V = 10
Very good adventure/war story. A little romance, a little sex, lots of fighting/swordplay. Great costumes and acting. Nobody can shoot straight.

English subs at Podnapisi are good, adjust them about 2.5 seconds faster.

Thanks Kefissos
